biotools.summary: The server is developed for predicting ß-turns in a protein from the amino acid sequence. It allows the user * to predict turns in a protein using existing statistical algorithms. * to predict the type of ß-turn such as Type I, I', II, II', VI, VIII and non-specific i.e., advanced prediction. * to predict the consensus ß-turn in a protein.

bioschemas.name: BetaTPred
